title: K.6
text: The student will apply history and social science skills to describe the relative location of people, places, and objects by using positional words, including, but not limited to near/far, over/under, above/below, left/right, behind/in front, next to and between.
subject: History & Social Science

title: K.7
text: The student will apply history and social science skills to demonstrate an understanding of maps and globes by
subject: History & Social Science
subs: identifying the similarities and differences between a map and a globe;
identifying land and bodies of water in the local community; and
identifying the geographic location of the United States and Virginia on a map and globe.
